name: everything is fine (breaknbake)
description:
A game with one color, in one window, where nothing is wrong and we're all fine. Jiggle the mouse around to find the response options.

I spent the entire weekend wedging Anurag Hazra's Verly physics engine (https://anuraghazra.github.io/Verly.js/) and David DeSandro's Zdog psuedo-3D engine (https://zzz.dog) into Twine's online interface on a chromebook.

This was my first experience with javascript and I'm fine 🙃
